clinical_study.brief_title: Chinese Health Investigation of Nurse Aging

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: A follow-up intervention for the climacteric symptoms of nurses in Peking

detailed_description.textblock: As we all know,hormone replacement therapy (HRT) is the main therapy to climacteric symptoms.But HRT has also some disadvantages including breast cancer,cardiovascular disease and so on, especially long period of HRT. It makes us to find the non-hormone therapy. So we want to investigate the exercise on the effect of climacteric symptoms.Doing exercise is helpful for avoiding and treating many disease,including climacteric symptoms.In our previous research,we found that playing exercise can treat moderate climacteric symptoms.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional

primary_outcome.description: KMI is the short of Kupperman index, which is a questionnaire that assesses the severity of women's climacteric symptoms.

secondary_outcome.description: blood lipid is an index to measure the effect of exercise.

study_pop.textblock: About 2000 nurese aged 40-55 living in peking will be investigated.We will measure the symptoms of perimenopausal syndrome by kupperman index、HRQOL（health -related quality of life) to evaluate the severity of menopausal syndrome and quality of life.We choose nurses whose KMI is above 15 and divided them into intervention group and control group.In intervention group,we give them health education and exercise intervention.
